PlanningListPageString.login_description: Log in to your Legatus account to access the study findings schedule.

ConfigurationPageString.login_description: Login is restricted to Legatus users with a test or customer account.
ConfigurationPageString.camera_permission: Access to the camera of this device when the application is active
ConfigurationPageString.camera_permission_desc: Allows you to take photos and record videos
ConfigurationPageString.microphone_permission: Accessing the microphone of this device when the application is active
ConfigurationPageString.microphone_permission_desc: Allows you to record dictations in audio format
ConfigurationPageString.photo_permission: Access to photos and multimedia content on this device when the application is active
ConfigurationPageString.photo_permission_desc: Allows you to view and share photos, dictations and videos made with the application
ConfigurationPageString.location_permission: Allow this device to be located when the application is active
ConfigurationPageString.location_permission_desc: Allows you to save coordinates GPS photos, notes and videos
ConfigurationPageString.storage_condition_desc: Delete observations to free up space on this device
ConfigurationPageString.image_size_desc: By checking this option, Legatus forces your device to record photos whose largest side will be 2048px maximum (standard 2k). Speed up transfers, limit storage size and minutes size.

ConfigurationPageString.photoResolutionDescription: Select the resolution of your choice for your photographs. The higher the resolution, the larger the files will be. A lower resolution will be applied if your device cannot achieve the chosen resolution.
ConfigurationPageString.maximumDesc: The best resolution your device is capable of
ConfigurationPageString.videoResolutionDescription: Select the resolution you want for your videos. The higher the resolution, the larger the files will be. A lower resolution will be applied if your device cannot achieve the chosen resolution.

LogoutDialog.description: Do you want to log out?

ReportDialog.title: Send Report
ReportDialog.description: Do you want to send an operation report to Legatus?

DeleteReportDialogString.title: Delete LocalReport
DeleteReportDialogString.content: Do you want to delete this finding? All local data will be deleted

DeleteMediaDialogString.content: Are you sure to delete local medias?

ReportPageString.noMediaDescription:
